title: Windows 10 Issue High ms
body: Right now I am trying to figure out why my ms is so high during games and i think the cause is Windows 10. In the first two days of my upgrade to Windows 10 the game was running fine but lately my ms has become unbearable. It has reached the point where none of my abilities will activate until 5 or 20 seconds later. I really don't know if its my internet or my drivers but I really need help.

replies.body: Okay I solved the problem! What I needed to do was repair my client and now the game works better. I suggest others do it too.
Have you tried going into Settings -> Privacy and then disabling just about all the sharing things, especially Location?
Everything in Privacy is off. I learned about that when I found all of those garbage apps.

Your network is having trouble maintaining a strong connection to the game server and causing a delay.  There can be a few reasons for this including settings in your OS.  It could also be due to a recent change in your ISP's routing.  We can rule out a couple possibilities by using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  This should help get back to a smooth game, but let me know and we can work this out!
